name: Anima App
headline: AI-Powered Design to Code.
description:
Anima is converting design to code, automatically.

Why does the world need Anima?
Taking user-interface design to production is hard.
Automated design-to-code will change the way we build software.

The future of Front-end
With Anima, designers can translate design to code in a single click.
- Need a website? Designers can create one directly from their design tool. Figma, Adobe XD,  or Sketch.
- Need to go from a prototype to a PoC asap? No coding required here as well.
- For engineers, it's a coding assistant, keeping developers in control. 
  Less grunt work, pushing-pixels, and design that is lost in translation.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:developer-tools; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:design-tools; location:new-york

##  Design to Code 
#### developer-friendly code
Skip the grunt work and speed up production with automated front-end code that developers can actually use.
[ Get Anima for Figma plugin ](https://www.animaapp.com/<https:/animaapp.com/an?url=https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/857346721138427857/anima-figma-to-code-react-html-vue-css-tailwind-devmode-inspect-react-html-vue-css&fallbackURL=&utm_content=new-hp&utm_campaign=figma-to-plugin&utm_medium=website&utm_source=content&mobileUrl=https://projects.animaapp.com/signup>)
![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/89137/1575x1575/260c2e72e6/from-design-to-code.png)
##  AI code personalization 
#### let Anima code like you
Start prompting in Figma with Anima's GenAI engine. Customize the code Anima produces so it resembles the way YOU code.
![](https://a.storyblok.com/f/89137/2100x2100/f0e775b17a/ai-code-personalization-by-anima.png)
##  AI Frontend automation 
#### with Frontier in VSCode
With [Frontier,](https://www.animaapp.com/</frontier>) Anima's coding assistant for frontend, teams convert Figma to React code effortlessly, in VSCode, by leveraging your existing codebase and reusing your design system components.
[ Get Frontier by Anima ](https://www.animaapp.com/<https:/animaapp.com/an?url=vscode:extension/animaapp.vscode-anima&fallbackURL=https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=AnimaApp.vscode-anima&utm_content=new-hp&utm_campaign=frontier&utm_medium=website&utm_source=content&mobileUrl=https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=AnimaApp.vscode-anima>)

generated_description:
**Anima App: Bridging Design and Development with AI**

Founded in 2017 and backed by Y Combinator (Batch S18), Anima App is carving out a niche in the tech landscape, particularly in New York. With a compact team of 20, Animaâ€™s mission is clear: to transform the cumbersome process of translating design into functional code through the power of AI. 

### Why Anima Matters
Letâ€™s face it: getting user-interface designs from concept to production is often a tedious task, fraught with missed details and endless back-and-forth between designers and developers. Anima is here to change that. By automating the design-to-code process, it stands to revolutionize how software is built, allowing designers to bring their visions to life with just a click.

### Key Features
1. **One-Click Code Generation**: Designers can create functional websites directly from tools like Figma, Adobe XD, or Sketchâ€”no coding skills required. 
2. **Rapid Prototyping**: Need to transform an idea into a proof of concept quickly? Anima makes the transition seamless without the burden of coding.
3. **Developer Friendly**: For engineers, Anima acts as a code assistant, streamlining repetitive tasks, refining pixel-perfect designs, and ensuring that intent is preserved in the final product.

### The Future of Front-end Development
The ability to seamlessly bridge design and code means that teams can work faster and more efficiently. With tools such as **Anima for Figma** and **Frontier for VSCode**, coding becomes an integrated part of the design processâ€”empowering teams to focus on creativity and innovation rather than getting bogged down by logistics.

### Animaâ€™s Offerings
- **Integration with Popular Design Tools**: Work within your favorite environments.
- **AI-Powered Customization**: Anima lets you customize the generated code to align more closely with your coding style, enhancing productivity.
- **Community and Resources**: Join the discussions on Anima's [forum](https://www.animaapp.com/forum) or check out their [blog](https://www.animaapp.com/blog) for tips and best practices.

With Anima, the dream of streamlined collaboration across design and development is closer than ever. Whether you're a designer eager to expedite the transition to functional sites or a developer tired of tedious task repetitions, Anima presents a compelling solution that could redefine your workflow.

For more insights and to get started, visit [Anima's website](https://www.animaapp.com).
